title: BT and ADVA Optical Networking Showcase the Future of NFV-Enabled Managed Services at SDN & ...
text: ( Source : ADVA Optical Networking SE) ADVA FSP 150 ProVM Plays Pivotal Role in Video-Surveillance Demonstration October 12 , 2015 ADVA Optical Networking today launched a joint demonstration with BT that reveals the future of managed services
